newsitem.title: JAPAN: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.
newsitem.headline: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.

text.p: Kobe rubber futures were mixed in extremely thin after-hours trade on Tuesday, as private investors retreated to the sidelines ahead of the spot expiry on Friday, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.5 yen per kg lower to 0.6 yen firmer than the day's close. Benchmark March was 0.5 yen down at 134.9 yen. Volume was 3,908 lots.

During the day, most prices drifted lower on sporadic selling. "Narrow-range trading is likely to continue for some time. Bumper rubber stocks will discourage fresh buying while the yen's weakness will limit price losses," one trader said.
